# toolPickerFramesObscuredDidChange(_:)

**Instance Method**

Tells the observer when the area that the tool picker obscures changes.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor optional func toolPickerFramesObscuredDidChange(_ toolPicker: PKToolPicker)
```

## Parameters

- **toolPicker**: The tool picker whose configuration changed.

## Monitoring visibility changes

- **toolPickerVisibilityDidChange(_:)**: Tells the observer when a person shows or hides the tool picker.
